oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anthology of the American Negro in the Theater: "Hallelujah!" Entry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; Vidor, King;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A brief overview of the Film "Hallelujah!," its director King Vidor, and its contribution to "the Negro struggle for recognition on the screen." From page 249 of the Anthology of the American Negro in the Theater.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
